name: Slider Navigation
description: A horizontal slider component for navigating between items with prev/next controls and direct selection.

items.description: Array of items to display in the slider

onChange.description: Callback fired when slide changes. Receives new index as parameter.

plainEnglishDescription: This block creates a slider that lets users navigate between multiple items. Think of it like a photo carousel - you can click arrows to go forward/backward, or click dots at the bottom to jump to a specific item. It's useful for showing code changes one at a time, where each slide represents a different file or code hunk. The slider tracks which item you're currently viewing and calls a function whenever you switch to a different item.
